thread.title: Thomas S
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Thomas S

author: Thomas S
title: Thomas S
text: Very very amazing company! All employees were so helpful and cheerful! My wife and I were first time home buyers and the made the whole approval and loan process so understandable and smooth! They were in constant contact with us and answered our many questions right away and made the process understandable! I highly recommend them and would refer anyone and everyone to them!! Best experience ever. Easier than we imagined it could ever be!
